sect1.title: Creating the loadkeys script
sect1.para: You only need to create this script if you don't have a default 101 keys US keyboard layout. Create a new file /etc/init.d/loadkeys containing the following:
sect1.literallayout:
cat > loadkeys << "EOF" #!/bin/sh # Begin /etc/init.d/loadkeys
# # Include the functions declared in the /etc/init.d/functions file #
source /etc/init.d/functions
# # Load the default keymap file #
echo -n "Loading keymap..." /usr/bin/loadkeys -d >/dev/null evaluate_retval
# End /etc/init.d/loadkeys EOF
